Attributes.description: Topics in the philosophy of science of special concern to the social sciences: the problem of objectivity, the use of models and evidence, causation and causal reasoning, formal methods, the status of social kinds and norms, scientific explanation, laws.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: (9 credits at the 200-level or above from philosophy, anthropology, geography, economics, history, political science, psychology or sociology.)
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Tue Thu, Start Time: 14:00, End Time: 15:30, Building: Buchanan, Room: B319
